ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Shadow Cat rolled out of the way of a few of Ares charges but was hit in the back by a stray shot, arching her back in pain as she yells out...dropping to her

Received: (qmail 27777 invoked from network); 18 Jun 2000 13:22:49 -0000
Received: from unknown (10.1.10.27) by m4.onelist.org with QMQP; 18 Jun 2000 13:22:49 -0000

Message-ID: <20000618132249.4974.qmail@...>

Date: Sun, 18 Jun 2000 06:22:49 -0700 (PDT)
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: "A.J. Gould" <black_panther_kitten@...>


Shadow Cat rolled out of the way of a few of Ares'
charges but was hit in the back by a stray shot,
arching her back in pain as she yells out...dropping
to her knees.
Snow Tech looked over at his sister as he heard her
yell, his optics growling wide as he saw her fall. He
snapped his head towards Ares and raised his lightning
gun towards the enemy, with a raged cry he pressed his
finger to the trigger and didn't let up until over a
dozen shots left the berral. With that done he then
rushed over to Shadow Cat and helped her to her feet,
actually being calmed by the fact that the damage
wasn't that bad. He made a weird face towards his
sister despite the moment, making him look like some 
' know it all '.

" I remember that, once upon a time, somebot told me
that only powder puffs cried out in pain, obviously I
have to start calling you Fluffy from now on, huh?"

 He smiled at her even when she pushed him away and
picked her splatter gun up from the ground, he was
always a joker but he could pick the worst times to
come up with a pun.
Shadow Cat looked up at Ares and growled at him but
then something caught her attention, it sounded like
thunder but as she looked there wasn't a cloud in the
sky. Then it hit her, a rocket!
She looked around and finally saw the deadly weapon
heading for Snow Tech and herself, she glanced over at
him with urgency and then jumped out of the
way...taking him with her.
Both Shadow Cat and Snow Tech hit the ground at the
same time as an explosion from the rocked impacting
sent a termer through the ground.
Snow Tech rubbed his head as he sat up and then
whacked his sis in the shoulder.

" Ow! Next time warn me when we're gunna take a dirt
dive, huh?!"

With that he then stood up and was about to help
Shadow Cat to her feet as well but then noticed that
she was already standing and firing off towards Koga
Shuko.
